attributes.action: Introduce a financial incentive to encourage people to hand in guns and knives to their local police stations.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People who resort to gun and knife crime are often living in deprivation. So how do we eradicate this? Well why don’t we just give everyone living in deprived areas a pot of gold? It won’t work will it? So let's introduce a real plan. Give people a financial incentive to give-up their weapons for high-street store vouchers. Why vouchers? Well we don’t want people spending it on drugs now do we?

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
